job.title: Software Development Engineer

our DCAI Group join our exciting and dynamic team as a Software Development Engineer where you will research design develop and optimize software tools that enable the use of Field Programmable Gate Arrays Our team acknowledged as among the worlds leading experts create stateoftheart CAD software tools and industryleading programmable logic device architecturesbrbrstronguResponsibilities Will otherslili Strong problemsolving skillslili Excellent verbal and written communication skillsbrliulIn this position you will gain invaluable experience that will allow growth and expanded Additional preferred qualifications are in addition to the minimum requirements and are considered a plus factor in identifying top candidatesbrbrstronguEducation Requirementbrustrongulli Bachelors years of experience in C or another modern objectoriented programming languagelili 4 plus years of experience with data structures and algorithmsbrliulstronguAdditional Preferred Qualificationsbrustrongulli Masters Degree or higherlili 10 plus years of experience in C software developmentlili 5 plus years of experience developing Electronic Design Automation EDA toolslili Experience as a technical lead on one major project driving it from conception through customer deliverybrliulstrongInside this Business GroupbrbrstrongThe Programmable Solutions Group PSG was formed from the acquisition of Altera As part of Intel PSG will create marketleading programmable logic devices that deliver a wider range of capabilities than customers experience today Combining Alteras industryleading FPGA technology and customer support with Intels worldclass semiconductor manufacturing capabilities will enable customers to create the next generation of electronic systems with unmatched performance and power efficiency PSG takes pride in creating an energetic and dynamic work environment that is driven by ingenuity and innovation We believe the growth and success of our group is directly linked to the growth and satisfaction of our employees That is why PSG is committed to a work environment that is flexible and collaborative and allows our employees to reach their full potentialbrbrstrongPosting StatementbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion religious creed sex national origin ancestry
